description.value:
Luminous and sometimes animated Tatoos or markings engraved onto the skin. Elaborate ones may often be the work of Hereteks, and the more Puritanical Tech-Priests may favour their forcible removal should it come to their knowledge.

Effect: Average

Notes: 10-100 T
